thread.section_title: St Martins Lane London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great central location
thread.title_full: Great central location - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kirstysmith888
title: Great central location
text:
If your looking for a great central hotel this is perfect. In the heart of Covent Garden and Leicester Square you are near to all the best places in London.
The Asia d Cuba restaurant has excellent food with a nice vibe.
The rooms are very nice, modern, simple and I like that you can change the lighting colour to suit your mood! Wifi is very good and easy to join.
I think the bar maybe lacks a bit of atmosphere but I prefer something with a view than just a room!
But over all I would highly recommend this hotel.
